author: JamesWTruher
body:
update testing-guidelines.md with new locations

Currently the scripting tests are divided across a couple directories, this will make discovery a little harder, we need to consolidate the scripting tests and Language/Scripting seems the most sensible location
i believe that this move retains history for the test files

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@JamesWTruher**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Jim Truher). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

title: move native execution tests to Language/Scripting/NativeExecution
